components.name: Database/Schema
components.description: Issues related to support for multiple Datasbases/Schemas

fields.description:
When executing an Query "USE bdm;DESC FORMATTED bdm_las_waybill_revoke_run_car_task;"
But when I try it again, It will success.
This is a random phenomenon.

Throw Exceptions like this

comments.body:
[~shiw019] can you provide details on how to reproduce?
Also can this be downgraded from Blocker priority
[~shiw019] Can you also check if you have any datanucleus caching parameters set in your hive configuration ?
Hi, is there any update on this issue?
